response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $800,000 to us, reflecting its unique features and capabilities that set it apart from any other offerings on the market. Given its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to secure a high-value asset at a competitive price. Should you choose to proceed, we can arrange for a detailed consultation to discuss the specifics and ensure a seamless transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
